Title: Charges and Specs
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Gil Ozeri, Gabe Liedman, Gil Ozeri (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake's latest investigation results in administrative leave, and, ultimately, his firing from the NYPD. Meanwhile, Charles goes into a funk after Vivian breaks up with him before their wedding, and the others try to cheer him up.
